attributes.action: ALL HIGH SCHOOLS TO EMPLOY TRAINED COUNSELLORS
attributes.additional_details:
All high schools to employ trained counsellors to look after our children's well-being within the school environment.

It should be compulsory for all 'Head Teachers' to attend a Bereavement Study Day. (Childhood Bereavement Network).  Also to have nominated teachers within school to support children that are grieving, especially after losing a 'parent' so that the childs education does not suffer.

My Daughter suffered tremendously at the school she attended after the sudden loss of her father 2010.  No child should have to 'suffer in silence' the way she did.

'Every child matters'
